caseSubject: Suit for specific performance/Agreement to sell
caseTitle: Anjum Aqeel v. Latif Mohammad Chaudhry and another
tagline: Discussion: (1) The resolution of disputes through arbitration often proves to be speedier than Court litigation which is also a form of alternative dispute resolution. (2) Section 13, 30  & 35 of the Arbitration Act, 1940. (3) What is misconduct of Arbitrator for setting aside the award by the Court.
